name: Glentham Life Sciences - Beta-Sitosterol 97%
description: Glentham Life Sciences, a fine chemicals manufacturer and supplier, offers Beta-Sitosterol at 97% purity for barrier repair and anti-inflammatory applications. High purity ensures consistent performance in cosmetic formulations. Beta-sitosterol is the most abundant phytosterol and provides excellent barrier support properties.
specializations.description: Glentham Life Sciences is a fine chemicals manufacturer and supplier offering Beta-Sitosterol with 97% purity. This high-purity phytosterol serves as a natural cholesterol alternative for barrier repair formulations, providing anti-inflammatory and barrier-supporting benefits.
specializations.notes: CAS 83-46-5. High purity (97%) from fine chemicals manufacturer. Beta-sitosterol is the most abundant phytosterol in plants, typically comprising 50-60% of total plant sterols. Provides barrier support and anti-inflammatory benefits. Suitable for research and commercial formulations.
notes: Fine chemicals manufacturer ensures high quality and purity. 97% purity specification provides excellent performance. CAS 83-46-5. Beta-sitosterol is primary phytosterol for barrier repair applications.
